about.story1: Jerm memories was born from a simple idea: what if you could never forget an important date again? Our founder, tired of missing birthdays and anniversaries, created a solution that combines beautiful flower delivery with smart scheduling technology.
about.story2: Starting in Yerevan, Armenia, we've grown from a small local flower shop to a technology-driven delivery service that serves thousands of customers across the country.
about.mission: To make every special moment unforgettable through beautiful flowers and reliable delivery.

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By accessing and using our application, you accept and agree to be bound by the terms and provision of this agreement. If you do not agree to abide by the above, please do not use this service.

services.title: Services Description
services.content: We provide bouquet delivery services with smart scheduling capabilities. Our services include: delivery of fresh flowers, personalized messages with QR codes, real-time delivery tracking, and flexible scheduling for special occasions. We currently deliver within Armenia with plans for international expansion.

userResponsibilities.title: User Responsibilities and Account Security
userResponsibilities.content: Users are responsible for: providing accurate delivery information including recipient details and addresses, ensuring someone is available to receive deliveries at the specified time, maintaining the security of their account credentials, updating their information when changes occur, and complying with all applicable laws and regulations.

payment.title: Payment Terms and Pricing
payment.content: Payment is required at the time of order placement. We accept various payment methods including credit cards, debit cards, and mobile payment systems. All prices are displayed in Armenian Dram (AMD) and include applicable taxes. We reserve the right to change prices with 30 days notice. Free delivery is provided within Yerevan city limits.

cancellation.title: Cancellation and Refund Policy
cancellation.content: Orders can be cancelled up to 24 hours before scheduled delivery without penalty. Cancellations made less than 24 hours before delivery may incur a 50% cancellation fee. Refunds will be processed within 5-7 business days to the original payment method. Custom or personalized orders may not be eligible for cancellation once production has begun.

delivery.title: Delivery Terms and Conditions
delivery.content: We strive to deliver on the scheduled date and time. Delivery times are estimates and may vary due to weather, traffic, or other circumstances beyond our control. If no one is available to receive the delivery, we will attempt to contact the recipient and may leave the bouquet in a safe location with photo confirmation. We are not responsible for items left unattended.

limitations.title: Limitations of Liability
limitations.content: Our liability is limited to the cost of the bouquet and delivery service. We are not liable for indirect, incidental, or consequential damages. We do not guarantee specific flower varieties due to seasonal availability and reserve the right to substitute with similar quality flowers.

modifications.title: Modifications to Terms
modifications.content: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. Users will be notified of significant changes via email or through the application. Continued use of our services after modifications constitutes acceptance of the new terms.

dataCollection.title: Information We Collect
dataCollection.content: We collect information you provide directly to us, such as when you create an account, place an order, or contact us. This includes: personal information (name, email, phone number), delivery information (addresses, recipient details), payment information (processed securely through our payment partners), and communication preferences. We also collect usage data to improve our services.

personalInfo.title: Personal Information Details
personalInfo.content: We collect: contact information (name, email, phone number), delivery addresses and recipient information, payment information (processed securely and not stored by us), account preferences and settings, communication history with our support team, and device information for app functionality. We do not collect sensitive personal information unless required for service delivery.

usage.title: How We Use Your Information
usage.content: We use your information to: process and fulfill your orders, schedule and coordinate deliveries, provide customer support and respond to inquiries, send important updates about your orders, improve our services and develop new features, send marketing communications (with your consent), comply with legal obligations, and prevent fraud and ensure security.

sharing.title: Information Sharing and Disclosure
sharing.content: We do not sell, trade, or rent your personal information to third parties. We may share information with: delivery partners (only necessary delivery information), payment processors (for transaction processing), service providers (who assist in our operations under strict confidentiality), legal authorities (when required by law), and in case of business transfers (with notice to users).

security.title: Data Security and Protection
security.content: We implement comprehensive security measures including: encryption of data in transit and at rest, secure payment processing through certified partners, regular security audits and updates, access controls and employee training, secure data storage with backup systems, and incident response procedures. However, no method of transmission over the internet is 100% secure.

rights.title: Your Privacy Rights
rights.content: You have the right to: access your personal information we hold, correct inaccurate or incomplete information, delete your personal information (subject to legal requirements), restrict or object to certain processing, data portability (receive your data in a structured format), withdraw consent for marketing communications, and lodge a complaint with supervisory authorities. Contact us at privacy@jermmemories.am to exercise these rights.

cookies.title: Cookies and Tracking Technologies
cookies.content: We use cookies and similar technologies to: remember your preferences and settings, analyze how you use our services, provide personalized content and recommendations, improve our website and app performance, and ensure security. You can control cookie settings through your browser, but disabling cookies may affect functionality.

retention.title: Data Retention
retention.content: We retain your personal information for as long as necessary to provide our services and fulfill the purposes outlined in this policy. Account information is retained while your account is active and for a reasonable period after closure. Order information is retained for legal and business purposes. Marketing data is retained until you opt out or for a maximum of 3 years.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about our bouquet delivery service

questions.question: How does the scheduling work?
questions.answer: Simply set up your important dates once in the app, and we'll automatically remind you and deliver beautiful bouquets on those special occasions.

questions.question: Can I customize my bouquet preferences?
questions.answer: Yes! You can set your favorite flowers, colors, and delivery preferences in your profile settings.

questions.question: What if I need to change a delivery date?
questions.answer: You can easily modify any scheduled delivery up to 24 hours before the delivery time through the app.

questions.question: Do you deliver on weekends and holidays?
questions.answer: Yes, we deliver 7 days a week, including holidays. We understand that special occasions don't wait for business days.

questions.question: What if the recipient is not home?
questions.answer: We'll contact the recipient to arrange the best delivery time, or leave the bouquet in a safe location with photo confirmation.

questions.question: Can I send bouquets internationally?
questions.answer: Currently, we deliver within Armenia. We're working on expanding to international delivery soon.

questions.question: How far in advance should I schedule?
questions.answer: You can schedule up to a year in advance. We recommend at least 48 hours notice for the best selection.

questions.question: What payment methods do you accept?
questions.answer: We accept all major credit cards, debit cards, and mobile payment methods including Apple Pay and Google Pay.
